name: Todos Comemos
headline: Taking from 1 to 100 the premade food industry in LATAM
description:
With the mission of improving people's lives in LATAM by enabling pre-made food access to millions of people, TodosComemos is pushing forward the actual barriers of the industry in LATAM by: 

1. Developing pre-made and ready-to-eat healthy food above-edge technologies for the region, 

2. Enabling established products and brands of prepared food to go from 1 to 1000, offering them a competitive distribution one-stop solution to reach millions of new customers in a multichannel strategy

3. Building the first pre-made food subscription service including both pre-made and ready-to-eat meals for all needs.

founders.name: Mateo Cardenas Huertas, Founder
founders.description: I am very passionate about the food industry, I have spent several years developing business models and technology to transform and innovate it.

founders.name: Santiago Espinosa, Founder
founders.description:
Jesus follower, happily married,  Dad and entrepreneur. Building TodosComemos to transform the food industry in LATAM taking it from 1 to 1000 in the premade food spectrum.

Formerly Co-founder & CEO of enlau.co now Ubanku, Delirato, El Cotero. M.A, B.A. Economist.

raw_markdown="![](https://www.todoscomemos.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Logo-TC-1.png)
# Taking the **Pre-made Food** industry from **1 to 100**
Our **one-stop solution for food manufacturers** streamlines sales and logistics, helping them to **grow exponentially** across multiple sales channels.
Are you a food producer?
[ Partner with us ](https://todoscomemos.com/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aopen%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6IjYwIiwidG9nZ2xlIjpmYWxzZX0%3D>)
![](https://www.todoscomemos.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/map-1.png)
![market-pointer](https://www.todoscomemos.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/market-1.png)
![](https://www.todoscomemos.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/product-1.png)
Our goal
We're the **one-stop solution** that allows **local products to reach the market,** enabling producers to achieve exponential growth.
[ Partner with us ](https://todoscomemos.com/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aopen%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6IjYwIiwidG9nZ2xlIjpmYWxzZX0%3D>)
## We are the highway for exponential growth.
The first integrated sales and logistic service that enables producers to grow exponentially in multiple sales channels. 
[ Partner with us ](https://todoscomemos.com/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aopen%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6IjYwIiwidG9nZ2xlIjpmYWxzZX0%3D>)
![](https://www.todoscomemos.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/img-truck-1.png)
Our Model
## Building an open book business model, we’re not your provider we’re your partner.
Working in-house as your exponential enabler.
Direct operational **costs are open and transparently** charged to producers.
We charge a 10% toll for using our highway. 
![](https://www.todoscomemos.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/img-hand-1.png)
## How does our highway work?
### Vertical integrated
### Sales , logistics and trade marketing for first time in one same place.
### Focused on new and high growing sales channels
### Convenience, fast delivery, hard discounts without missing traditional channels. 
### Exclusively for food products that require cold chain
### Frozen or refrigerated.
### Tech enabled and automated
### Building end to end ERP solution.
![Logo](https://www.todoscomemos.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Logo-Todos-Comemos.svg)
## See how the highway works
Maximize your sales potential and optimize your operations with our integrated sales and logistics service, tailored to help producers succeed in multiple channels.
![](https://www.todoscomemos.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/sales-channel-1.png)
### Sales channels
Fast Deliveries companies, Convenience stores, Pharmacies, Retailers, Dark stores, D2C, Foody Market.
![](https://www.todoscomemos.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/delivery-img.png)
### Logistics
Fulfillment and micro fulfillment centers, Cold supply chain, 24 hours lead time to delivery. Dedicated logistics coordinator. Real-time cost calculator.
![](https://www.todoscomemos.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/inventory-img.png)
### Included On-top Services
Sell-in management, trade-Marketing for every sales channel, invoicing, and inventory management.
## Take your business to the next level.
Start growing today and launch your product onto the market.
[ Partner with us ](https://todoscomemos.com/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aopen%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6IjYwIiwidG9nZ2xlIjpmYWxzZX0%3D>)
## Be our next **success story like them!**
![](https://www.todoscomemos.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/logo_franui_header-1.svg)
From 0 sales in Colombia to 150.000 USD / Month in 60 days.
![](https://www.todoscomemos.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Santi-1.png)
## Santiago Espinosa
Formerly Co-founder & CEO of enlau.co (the first and largest university marketplace in the region, reaching +150.000 users) 
[ ](https://todoscomemos.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/santiagoespinosam/>)
[/santiagoespinosam](https://todoscomemos.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/santiagoespinosam/>)
![](https://www.todoscomemos.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/mateo-1-1.png)
## Mateo Cárdenas
Formerly Co-founder and CEO of Delirato (the first cloud kitchen chain in Colombia back in 2017). +7 locations.
[ ](https://todoscomemos.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/mateocardenas/>)
[/mateocardenas/](https://todoscomemos.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/mateocardenas/>)
Our Management Board
## Our dream is to contribute to developing the **pre-made food industry in LATAM** so we all can have a better and healthier life.
Now we are creating the **largest food highway on the region.**
[ Partner with us ](https://todoscomemos.com/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aopen%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6IjYwIiwidG9nZ2xlIjpmYWxzZX0%3D>)
## Be our next success story
Focus on production, we will focus on your growth

generated_description:
# Todos Comemos: Revolutionizing the Pre-made Food Landscape in LATAM

Todos Comemos, founded in 2020 and hailing from Bogotá, Colombia, is on a mission to expand the pre-made food industry from 1 to 100. As part of Y Combinator’s S20 Batch, this innovative company is determined to transform how people in Latin America access healthy, convenient meals.

## What They Do

At its core, Todos Comemos seeks to enhance lives by providing better access to pre-made food options. Here’s how they’re doing it:

1. **Cutting-Edge Solutions**: The company is developing advanced technologies specifically for the pre-made food sector in LATAM. This approach ensures that local producers can offer healthier meal options that appeal to a wider audience.

2. **Scaling Businesses**: Todos Comemos acts as a booster for established food brands, providing a one-stop distribution solution that allows them to scale rapidly—from reaching a handful of customers to thousands—through a multichannel sales strategy.

3. **Subscription Services**: They are building the region's first subscription service that offers a diverse range of pre-made and ready-to-eat meals, catering to varying dietary needs and preferences.

## Business Model

Todos Comemos describes itself as more than just a service provider—it's a growth partner. They utilize an open book model, which means they transparently charge producers for operational costs alongside a 10% fee for using their logistics "highway." 

Their platform integrates sales, logistics, and trade marketing, allowing food producers to streamline their operations and thrive in both traditional and new sales channels. This includes fast delivery services and a robust cold supply chain for perishable goods.

## Target Audience

The company targets local food producers looking to grow their market reach without the headache of managing complex logistics. By improving access to various sales channels—including convenience stores, pharmacies, and direct-to-consumer sales—they empower these producers to optimize their operations and maximize sales potential.

## Success Stories

Todos Comemos has already begun creating success stories, helping some businesses—like Franui—transition from zero sales to generating $150,000 a month within just two months. Their management team blends experience from the food tech and marketplace industries, with co-founders Santiago Espinosa and Mateo Cárdenas bringing their significant expertise to the table.

## Future Goals

The overarching dream of Todos Comemos is to contribute to the development of a robust pre-made food industry in LATAM, fostering healthier lifestyles across the region. Their vision involves creating the largest food highway, significantly enhancing the efficiency of food distribution and access.

By focusing on strategic partnerships and technological innovation, Todos Comemos is poised to lead the charge in making pre-made food accessible to millions, effectively taking the industry from 1 to 100. 

For more insights or to learn how to partner with them, visit their website at [Todos Comemos](https://todoscomemos.com).
